REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1200 reute b f BC-TAMURA-CORP-ISSUES-70 03-31 0051

TEXT.TITLE: TAMURA CORP ISSUES 70 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Tamura Corp is issuing 70 mln Swiss francs of five-year straight notes with a 4-3/4 pct coupon and par issue price, lead manager Swiss Bank Corp said. Payment is due April 15. The notes are guaranteed by the Sumitomo Bank Ltd. REUTER
